import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styles/PopForm.css' import userFrame from '../icons/frame.png' import downarrw from '../icons/arrow-down.png' export default function DropMenu(props ){ const title=props.title return(
{title}
{props.dropmenu &&
  • props.handleChange('ios Developer') }>ios Developer
  • props.pickRole('Android Developer') }>Android Developer
  • props.pickRole('Full Stack Developer') }>Full Stack Developer
  • props.pickRole('Front-end Developer') }>Front-end Developer
  • props.pickRole('Back-end Developer') }>Back-end Developer
}
) }
